sentence.Network_en: Ecological revetment is a fundamental mean of restoring ecology of waterway in waterway regulation.
sentence.Network_cn: 航道整治中采用生态护坡是恢复航道生态的基础.

sentence.Network_en: The experiment proves that the hydraulic roughness of the turf revetment ranges from 0.020 to 0.090.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究表明,草皮糙率的大致范围为0.020~0.090,主要与土壤类型、肥沃程度、水流条件等有关.

sentence.Network_en: Different risks may often come up in constructing and operating the bank revetment.
sentence.Network_cn: 护岸工程在建造和运营中,经常会遇到各种风险.
